org.smooks.delivery

Class ContentHandlerBinding<T extends ContentHandler>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.smooks.delivery.ContentHandlerBinding<T>

  • public class ContentHandlerBinding<T extends ContentHandler>
extends Object
    Mapping between a resource configuration and its corresponding resource configuration.

    Obviously this class is only relevant when the resource configuration refers to a ContentHandler.

    Author:
    tfennelly
